title: Email Recover
body: I found out someone has been in my account and i tried to report it but it says more information is required. Honestly, theres nothing more I can put. I checked on which email its linked with and thats email isnt even close to any of my emails. I need this recovered.

replies.body: If your account has been accessed by an unauthorized user, it's important to take measure right away to[ secure your account](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694-Recovering-Your-Account)!    Since you might be having trouble claiming the registered email, reach out to us in a[ player support ticket ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)and our account team can help out.  We'll respond as soon as possible!
